title: aparaadhamula maanpi
sahitya:
aparAdhamulamAnpi AdukOvayyA 
(aparAdhamula)

anupallavi

krpa jUci brOcitE kIrti galadika nIku  
(aparAdhamula)

caraNam 1

atyanta matsara madAndhuDai sajjanula nitya karmamulavalE
nindincu konna nA  
(aparAdhamula)

caraNam 2

cUcuvArala keduTa sokki japituDanaiti yOcinca
nIpAdayugala dhyAnamulEni nA  
(aparAdhamula)

caraNam 3

straina janulanu gUDi viNADitini gAni prANahita
guNakathala balka lEnaiti nA  
(aparAdhamula)

caraNam 4

sharaNu joccina nannu karuNincavE rAma vara tyAgarAjanuta
vashamu gAdika nAku  
(aparAdhamula)
